play with. One day, the barrel became broken, and Bobo was very sad.

Toto went to Dodo's house and asked, "Can I borrow some tape to fix Bobo's broken barrel?" Dodo said, "Yes, of course!" Toto took the tape and went back to Bobo's house. Together, they fixed the broken barrel.

the ground, its leg was broken. Jane gasped in shock.
The ant was scared and started to cry. Jane wanted to help, so she ran back to her house. She grabbed a bandaid, and ran back to the park. The ant was so happy when she saw Jane and the bandaid!
Jane gently picked up the ant and used the bandaid to put its leg back together. In no time, the ant was able to hop away happily.
Jane smiled and said, "See, your leg is all better now."

Once upon a time, in a small house, there lived a boy named Tim. Tim was a foolish boy who liked to scare his friends. One day, he found a magazine with a big, scary face on it. Tim had a plan to scare his best friend, Sam.
Tim took the magazine to Sam's house. He hid behind a tree and waited for Sam to come out. When Sam walked out of his house, Tim jumped out from behind

. The football got a hole and air came out. The football was broken. Tim was very sad and started to cry. He didn't know what to do.
Tim's mom saw him crying and asked, "Why are you crying, Tim?" Tim showed her the broken football. His mom hugged him and said, "Don't worry, Tim. We can get a new football for you."
Tim stopped crying and smiled. He was happy his mom would get him a new football. They went to the store and got a new football. Tim played with his new football every day and took good care of it.
